summary: It is no longer necessary to hold down the shout button for a full second to activate all three words of a shout.
descriptionHtml:
This modifies the \"Shouttime1\" and \"Shouttime2\" game settings to near 0. What this means is that your shout will activate sooner after you hit the shout button, and you can move on to other actions (i.e. swinging your sword) sooner after hitting the shout button.

made using skyedit
author: Ilverin
